abilities.name: Unlucky Charm
abilities.description: When any finite number is in battle with {numberhuman}, all of their attacks have a 50% chance to be less effective, with 20% of attacks not doing anything at all.

abilities.name: Celestial Beams
abilities.description: {numberhuman} has different attacks depending on the time of day. They both work like rapid fire beams she can shoot out of their hand, and deal 10 HP of damage per hit.

abilities.name: Dragon Mayhem
abilities.description: {numberhuman} shoots fire out of their mouth. (Determine damage once i figure out health)

abilities.name: Healthy Salad
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can provide numbers with healthy salad that can heal between 30% to 60% of HP depending on how big or small the number is.

abilities.name: Spear
abilities.description: {numberhuman}'s spear can either stun an opponent for 2 turns or deal damage (determine before release)

abilities.name: Repeated Function
abilities.description: {numberhuman} heals 10% of all team members' HP every turn. There cannot be more than one {numberhuman} in a team.

abilities.name: Universe Teleporter
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can teleport objects from any universe. They can only teleport objects that are smaller than or as big as themself.

abilities.name: Limiting
abilities.description: For numbers below {numberhuman}, their attacks are limited to only work for 1 second.

abilities.name: Delete Health
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can use the command panel to modify the entity however they wish. They cannot deal more than 30% damage per turn.

abilities.name: Steel Tray
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can smack opponents in the head with their steel tray. This will stun them, so they cannot attack next turn.

abilities.name: Jumpscare
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can jumpscare the opponent, stunning them for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Omni Ordinal
abilities.description: {numberhuman} is a master of combat. Their sword deals anywhere between 30 and 50 HP of damage per hit.

abilities.name: Don't Hurt Me
abilities.description: {numberhuman} cannot take damage, but cannot attack. Instead, there is a 40% chance for {numberhuman} to rebound 25% of damage (to other team members) towards the opposing team.

abilities.name: Full Circle
abilities.description: Stella didn't give a description for this ability so I have no idea what it does.

abilities.name: Full Circle again
abilities.description: Stella didn't give a description for this ability so I have no idea what it does.

abilities.name: Knowledge is Power
abilities.description: {numberhuman} will distract opponents by telling them about something fascinating. This makes them lower their defenses, making attacks on them stronger.

abilities.name: Tech Support
abilities.description: If a team member is below 40% max HP, {numberhuman} will slowly increase their health to 50% HP and make their attacks 20% stronger. This only works once per team member.

abilities.name: Special Ingredient
abilities.description: {numberhuman} will feed an opposing team member their soup. It is secretly poisonous, and that team member will lose 2 HP per second.

abilities.name: Streamer Power
abilities.description: {numberhuman} receives fanmail. In it is a random weapon that they can use.

abilities.name: Reprogramming
abilities.description: {numberhuman} will reprogram the game, giving their team a 20% chance to have two turns in a row.

abilities.name: Forgetting
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can make any number forget how to do their special ability. This works half of the time.

abilities.name: dumb stupid
abilities.description: {numberhuman} is dumb and stupid. They'll fail to attack half the time.

abilities.name: Power of God
abilities.description: {numberhuman} solos any finite number, and can stun numbers between Omega and Absolute Infinity for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Be Square
abilities.description: Four can only be attacked by numbers with at least one square divisor (excluding 1).

abilities.name: Double Trouble
abilities.description: There are two of them. Both have the same HP and ATK.

abilities.name: Nullify
abilities.description: When the opposing team attacks, {numberhuman} has a 10% chance to make the attack deal 0 damage.

abilities.name: Up Arrow
abilities.description: There is a 2% chance for {numberhuman} to raise an attack's damage to the third power.

abilities.name: Set of all Numbers
abilities.description: {numberhuman} deals 1.5x as much damage towards finite numbers.

abilities.name: Lucky Charm
abilities.description: All attacks against finite numbers are 10% more powerful when {numberhuman} is in the team.

abilities.name: Collision Course
abilities.description: {numberhuman} throws asteroids at opponents, dealing anywhere from 10% to 20% damage.

abilities.name: Imagination
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can imagine any method of healing the opponent, and translate it into an attack in reality by squaring themself. This deals up to 100 HP of damage.

abilities.name: Floral Fury
abilities.description: {numberhuman} will attack the enemy team with poisonous plants. The damage this deals is 5% per second of the weakest team member (in terms of HP).

abilities.name: ITERUM!
abilities.description: {numberhuman} will retrigger your weakest Numberhuman (that can still do damage) and make it do double damage.

abilities.name: High Five
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can give one team member a high five, making their next attack 1.5x as powerful.

abilities.name: Six Feet Under
abilities.description: Stella didn't give a description for this ability so I have no idea what it does.

abilities.name: Magic Ball
abilities.description: Every attack from the opposing team has to go through {numberhuman}. If the magic 8-ball returns a negative response, the attack is nullified.

abilities.name: Nine Lives
abilities.description: {numberhuman} has 80% less max HP, but can revive themself nine times.

abilities.name: DEKATRIA!
abilities.description: If the same Numberhuman attacks twice, {numberhuman} will gain a percentage of its attack power on top of {numberhuman}'s base. (That Numberhuman will not lose attack power.

abilities.name: Disguise
abilities.description: {numberhuman} will disguise as a number on the enemy team, allowing it to weaken defenses, but every turn, the chances of it getting caught increase by x1.2 compounding per turn, starting at 20%. If caught, {numberhuman} loses.

abilities.name: Infinite Power Glitch
abilities.description: Theoretcally, since SFP > SFP, he is genuinely more powerful than himself. As such, he can essentially accumulate power from nothing, growing more and more powerful with seemingly no arbitrary endpoint. Every use of this ability rises his attack by 20%.

abilities.name: None
abilities.description: General has no ability. To compensate, they have much higher statistics.

abilities.name: Finalize
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can finalize targets. There is a 5% chance for the target after their turn to instantly die.

abilities.name: Cube Pelting
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can barrage the target with lots of small cubes. This can damage up to 25 - 50% of the numberhuman's max health as damage, depending on health.

abilities.name: Compression
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can compress targets, reducing their health and attack by 33%.

abilities.name: Nerfing
abilities.description: If the target's attack value is greater than {numberhuman}'s, it will temporarily nerf the target's attack value to {numberhuman}'s.

abilities.name: Shell Trapping
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can trap targets in a shell, rendering them vunerable and unable to attack. It breaks after 2 turns or if enough damage was dealt to it.

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.description: {numberhuman} can corrupt other numberhumans out of anger. This will constantly hurt them and deplete 2 HP per second.
Pararinounhuman uses her beatiful and attractive dancing skills, which distracts all enemies for 2 Turns.
abilities.name: Fashion Dance

abilities.description: edA+'s nature is... kinda fucked. As such, descibing him can end up being kind of a hastle. This ability embodies that fact. -20% to the opponent's defense whenever used in combat. (Ability by GMDM)
abilities.name: SL4 Confusions

abilities.description: Higher attack than usual. After he attacks, he may not be used to attack for the next turn & he may not be retriggered. Every third attack, he will instakill a numberhuman on the spot. He can't attack for the next turn after instakill, and he can't attack before/during the third turn after instakill.
abilities.name: High Limit

abilities.description: {numberhuman} can nullify one attack throughout the whole battle. (This number can be increased with rare evolutions)
abilities.name: A Single Hitpoint

abilities.description: Every time they uses this ability, they makes it so that all of his stats are 1% (compounding) higher than his opponent's for no reason besides the fact that they can.
abilities.name: Definition-Transcendentalism

abilities.description: Upon using this ability, they nullify any attack given by any opponent, no matter what, for the next five turns.
abilities.name: qApotheosis

abilities.description: nanannannanbahjegsbujghnjnmdhgjnghghrfhg real shit this is the most powerful numberhuman ever exists you suck if you say no you die lol idiot
abilities.name: absolute aperdinal

abilities.description: {numberhuman} is too big to be a constructible collection, so their exact elements are hard to determine. Because of this, opponents may be confused upon seeing them. As such, they have time to attack three times in a row at the start of the battle before her opponent feels prepared to make their move.
abilities.name: Unconstructibility

abilities.description: 99% of the time, this ability does nothing. 1% of the time, this ability instantly kills an opponent, and it can never be used in any battle ever again.
abilities.name: El Pepe

abilities.description: Ignores every attack whose attack power is in range of half their (maximum) HP ~ their (maximum) HP
abilities.name: Unknown

abilities.description: Every round, {numberhuman} gains 1% of the strongest opposing Numberhuman's attack power. This Numberhuman does not lose stats.
abilities.name: All Mine!

abilities.description: {numberhuman} has much higher attack than usual, attacking takes away a lot of health remaining. too bad you can't choose the target you desire
abilities.name: Deceitful Decay

abilities.description: {numberhuman} has lower health than usual, but can regenerate over time.
abilities.name: Regeneration

abilities.description: Dictionarie Myasthie will always do critical hits, or make one other team member have a guaranteed critical hit, because she knows the flaws of her opponents.
abilities.name: Studious

abilities.description: This ability starts off fairly weak, but every turn, it grows more and more powerful. Eventually, if you let it build up, you can use it to create a powerful blast! However, using this ability will cause it to reset back to its original strength.
abilities.name: Apex of def-strength

abilities.description: heals all numberhumans by a percentage of the canceled damage, increased by number of initial limits in your lineup.
abilities.name: Healing Hardcap
Critical Precision
abilities.description: Gradient Unit is a robot, and much more precise than other Numberhumans. If Gradient Unit is on the team, 25% of all attacks are critical. There can only be one Gradient Unit on a team.

abilities.name: Thought-Transcendence
abilities.description: PIL+ can use this ability to overpower the opponent's mind so much that it stuns them. This makes it so that they cannot attack or dodge for one turn.

abilities.name: Take the Shot
abilities.description: Using this ability allows {numberhuman} to shoot their rifle at the opponent, depleting a quarter of their current HP immediately.

abilities.name: Anything it Takes
abilities.description: Any number with a rarity of common takes double damage from {numberhuman}.

abilities.name: Look at Me!
abilities.description: On use, prevent all enemies from attacking unless it is towards {numberhuman} and grant a 25% damage reduction and HP boost for 3 turns

abilities.name: BREAK ALL PLEXES
abilities.description: Grants a permanent 50% damage boost while ability is inactive. If activated, grant a 5% chance to instakill, however it can only be used once in battle and you lose the 50% boost if failed.

abilities.name: Resolve
abilities.description: SBAHP works out some conflicts with an opponent. Their attacks are reduced by 50% for the entire battle. This can only be used once.

abilities.name: UNIQ--postMath
abilities.description: She will always perform the mathematically best move while playing fair. Grants a random damage boost between 1-50%.

abilities.name: Flip a coin
abilities.description: He has a 50% chance of taking 10% damage to opponents, otherwise heals team members by 10% HP.

abilities.name: something called lifesteal
abilities.description: At the end of every other turn, BEAF Limit will recover half of the HP they lost in the past two turns.

abilities.name: Magic
abilities.description: The Magixystal casts a spell on the other team. The whole team will now lose 5% of the weakest team member's HP every turn for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: What does attack power do?
abilities.description: Reduces damage taken by AP^0.7 upon getting attacked. (Cancelled damage)^0.8 is reflected back to the attacker. Once he is defeated, he uses the last bit of his energy to instakill any opponent that has less HP than him. To balance this, he loses 1% HP every turn.

abilities.name: idk what to call the ability
abilities.description: Everyone on TUoG's team does 1.6x as much damage towards standard googology numbers.

abilities.name: Chest Hole
abilities.description: By reaching inside her chest hole, she can give herself a slightly less powerful version of any ability that a member of the opposing team has.

abilities.name: Mind Control
abilities.description: Each turn, Opera Convulsions can pick one opponent to control, and make them attack some of the other members in their team. She loses 250 HP when she does this, and this multiplies for every additional person she tries to control.

abilities.name: 179 Uncentillion
abilities.description: Gains +10% base attack every 3 turns. Scaling increases by +2% additively every 6 turns.

abilities.name: Omegascaled Magic
abilities.description: Chrona Beyonum casts a spell on the other team. The whole team will now lose 9% of the weakest team member's HP every turn for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: This is Fine
abilities.description: Archaea Volcanis will burn the opponent. The opponent is stunned for the next turn, and their attack on the turn after that is reduced by 40%.

abilities.name: Dollhouse
abilities.description: Every 5 turns, Absolute Nothing of Numbers can turn a team member into a doll. For the next two turns, she can use their ability, before it gets reverted back to normal.

abilities.name: Untitled Ability
abilities.description: Truncated Limitation is very protective. All attacks against other team members are 5% less effective.

abilities.name: FIRIN MY LAZORS
abilities.description: << MINDCAP >> can shoot lasers from her back. Any opponent hit will have their attacks become 2% less effective (compounding), for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Glass
abilities.description: Entropy Undefined-INF will attack the opponent with glass. This will deal anywhere from 5% to 10% max HP of damage, with higher damages being exponentially harder to get.
